data.title: A Major European Bank Opened Crypto Trading to Everyday Customers—Here's Why That Matters for Bitcoin's Next Move
data.description: Traditional banking is finally embracing cryptocurrency in a way that could reshape retail investor access across Europe. This week, Spain's-based Banco Santander (NYSE:SAN) rolled out digital currency trading on its Openbank platform—a move signaling ...
data.keywords: Banco Santander, digital banking, Charlie Munger, cryptocurrency
